overview:
Rich Keck adds 25 years of operational and financial experience to the Aventura team. He worked at Continental Bank while attending the Booth School of Business at the University of Chicago.

He served as VP of Finance at a number of companies including Abercrombie & Kent, Corporate Software and the (i) Structure division of Level 3 Communications. Prior to joining Aventura, he served as CFO of Collective Intellect, a media analytics firm which developed technology for the marketing research industry. He has worked closely for many years with Howard Diamond, our CEO, who says that Rich has “an incredibly intuitive sense for operations and finance.” Rich thinks that Aventura can be instrumental in helping hospitals move to a virtualized desktop environment, which will save a ton of capex dollars as thin clients replace more demanding PCs and laptops.
